meanings.definition: The state or quality of being perpetual.
meanings.sent1: The perpetuities of the stars in the sky amaze me.
meanings.sent2: The perpetuities of nature never cease to inspire wonder.
meanings.sent3: The perpetuities of the clock's ticking made it seem like time stood still.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like the perpetuities of a flowing river, never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The perpetuities of the ocean waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Something that is perpetual or lasts indefinitely.
meanings.sent1: The perpetuities of friendship bring joy to our lives.
meanings.sent2: The perpetuities of tradition are cherished by many families.
meanings.sent3: The perpetuities of a never-ending buffet sounded like a dream come true.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work was like the perpetuities of a burning flame.
meanings.sent5: The perpetuities of the ancient ruins tell stories of the past.
